verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Again the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man הוֹדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> to know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> cause Jerusalem אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תּוֹעֲבֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H8441><s%> her abominations

וְאָמַרְתָּ֞ <S%H559><s%> And say כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֤י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִה֙ <S%H3069><s%> GOD לִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> unto Jerusalem מְכֹרֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H4351><s%> Thy birth וּמֹ֣לְדֹתַ֔יִךְ <S%H4138><s%> and thy nativity מֵאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [is] of the land הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֑י <S%H3669><s%> of Canaan אָבִ֥יךְ <S%H1><s%> thy father הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <S%H567><s%> [was] an Amorite וְאִמֵּ֥ךְ <S%H517><s%> and thy mother חִתִּֽית׃ <S%H2850><s%> an Hittite

וּמוֹלְדוֹתַ֗יִךְ <S%H4138><s%> And [as for] thy nativity בְּי֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day הוּלֶּ֤דֶת <S%H3205><s%> thou wast born אֹתָךְ֙ <S%H853><s%> לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor כָרַּ֣ת <S%H3772><s%> was not cut שָׁרֵּ֔ךְ <S%H8270><s%> thy navel וּבְמַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> in water לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor רֻחַ֖צְתְּ <S%H7364><s%> neither wast thou washed לְמִשְׁעִ֑י <S%H4935><s%> to supple וְהָמְלֵ֙חַ֙ <S%H4414><s%> [thee] thou wast not salted לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor הֻמְלַ֔חַתְּ <S%H4414><s%> at all וְהָחְתֵּ֖ל <S%H2853><s%> nor swaddled לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor חֻתָּֽלְתְּ׃ <S%H2853><s%> at all

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> No חָ֨סָה <S%H2347><s%> pitied עָלַ֜יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> and עַ֗יִן <S%H5869><s%> None eye לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> thee to do לָ֛ךְ אַחַ֥ת <S%H259><s%> any מֵאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these לְחֻמְלָ֣ה <S%H2550><s%> of these unto thee to have compassion עָלָ֑יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> on וַֽתֻּשְׁלְכִ֞י <S%H7993><s%> upon thee but thou wast cast out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into פְּנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> in the open הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> field בְּגֹ֣עַל <S%H1604><s%> to the lothing נַפְשֵׁ֔ךְ <S%H5315><s%> of thy person בְּי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day הֻלֶּ֥דֶת <S%H3205><s%> that thou wast born אֹתָֽךְ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וָאֶעֱבֹ֤ר <S%H5674><s%> And when I passed עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H5921><s%> and וָֽאֶרְאֵ֔ךְ <S%H7200><s%> by thee and saw מִתְבּוֹסֶ֖סֶת <S%H947><s%> thee polluted בְּדָמָ֑יִךְ <S%H1818><s%> in thine own blood וָאֹ֤מַר <S%H559><s%> I said לָךְ֙ בְּדָמַ֣יִךְ <S%H1818><s%> unto thee [when thou wast] in thy blood חֲיִ֔י <S%H2421><s%> Live וָאֹ֥מַר <S%H559><s%> yea I said לָ֖ךְ בְּדָמַ֥יִךְ <S%H1818><s%> unto thee [when thou wast] in thy blood חֲיִֽי׃ <S%H2421><s%> Live

רְבָבָ֗ה <S%H7233><s%> thee to multiply כְּצֶ֤מַח <S%H6780><s%> as the bud הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> of the field נְתַתִּ֔יךְ <S%H5414><s%> I have caused וַתִּרְבִּי֙ <S%H7235><s%> and thou hast increased וַֽתִּגְדְּלִ֔י <S%H1431><s%> and waxen great וַתָּבֹ֖אִי <S%H935><s%> and thou art come בַּעֲדִ֣י <S%H1157><s%> for עֲדָיִ֑ים <S%H5716><s%> to excellent שָׁדַ֤יִם <S%H7699><s%> [thy] breasts נָכֹ֙נוּ֙ <S%H3559><s%> are fashioned וּשְׂעָרֵ֣ךְ <S%H8181><s%> and thine hair צִמֵּ֔חַ <S%H6779><s%> is grown וְאַ֖תְּ <S%H859><s%> you עֵרֹ֥ם <S%H5903><s%> whereas thou [wast] naked וְעֶרְיָֽה׃ <S%H6181><s%> and bare

וָאֶעֱבֹ֨ר <S%H5674><s%> Now when I passed עָלַ֜יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> over וָאֶרְאֵ֗ךְ <S%H7200><s%> by thee and looked וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold עִתֵּךְ֙ <S%H6256><s%> upon thee behold thy time עֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> [was] the time דֹּדִ֔ים <S%H1730><s%> of love וָאֶפְרֹ֤שׂ <S%H6566><s%> and I spread כְּנָפִי֙ <S%H3671><s%> my skirt עָלַ֔יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> over וָאֲכַסֶּ֖ה <S%H3680><s%> over thee and covered עֶרְוָתֵ֑ךְ <S%H6172><s%> thy nakedness וָאֶשָּׁ֣בַֽע <S%H7650><s%> yea I sware לָ֠ךְ וָאָב֨וֹא <S%H935><s%> unto thee and entered בִבְרִ֜ית <S%H1285><s%> into a covenant אֹתָ֗ךְ <S%H854><s%> for נְאֻ֛ם <S%H5002><s%> with thee saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD וַתִּ֥הְיִי <S%H1961><s%> you became לִֽי׃

וָאֶרְחָצֵ֣ךְ <S%H7364><s%> Then washed בַּמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> I thee with water וָאֶשְׁטֹ֥ף <S%H7857><s%> yea I throughly washed away דָּמַ֖יִךְ <S%H1818><s%> thy blood מֵֽעָלָ֑יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> and וָאֲסֻכֵ֖ךְ <S%H5480><s%> from thee and I anointed בַּשָּֽׁמֶן׃ <S%H8081><s%> thee with oil

וָאַלְבִּישֵׁ֣ךְ <S%H3847><s%> I clothed רִקְמָ֔ה <S%H7553><s%> thee also with broidered work וָאֶנְעֲלֵ֖ךְ <S%H5274><s%> and shod תָּ֑חַשׁ <S%H8476><s%> thee with badgers' skin וָאֶחְבְּשֵׁ֣ךְ <S%H2280><s%> and I girded בַּשֵּׁ֔שׁ <S%H8336><s%> thee about with fine linen וַאֲכַסֵּ֖ךְ <S%H3680><s%> and I covered מֶֽשִׁי׃ <S%H4897><s%> thee with silk

וָאֶעְדֵּ֖ךְ <S%H5710><s%> I decked עֶ֑דִי <S%H5716><s%> thee also with ornaments וָאֶתְּנָ֤ה <S%H5414><s%> and I put צְמִידִים֙ <S%H6781><s%> bracelets עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> around יָדַ֔יִךְ <S%H3027><s%> upon thy hands וְרָבִ֖יד <S%H7242><s%> and a chain עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> around גְּרוֹנֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1627><s%> on thy neck

וָאֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> And I put נֶ֙זֶם֙ <S%H5141><s%> a jewel עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in אַפֵּ֔ךְ <S%H639><s%> on thy forehead וַעֲגִילִ֖ים <S%H5694><s%> and earrings עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in אָזְנָ֑יִךְ <S%H241><s%> in thine ears וַעֲטֶ֥רֶת <S%H5850><s%> crown תִּפְאֶ֖רֶת <S%H8597><s%> and a beautiful בְּרֹאשֵֽׁךְ׃ <S%H7218><s%> upon thine head

וַתַּעְדִּ֞י <S%H5710><s%> Thus wast thou decked זָהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> with gold וָכֶ֗סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and silver וּמַלְבּוּשֵׁךְ֙ <S%H4403><s%> and thy raiment [שֵׁשִׁי כ] (שֵׁ֤שׁ <S%H8336><s%> blue ק) וָמֶ֙שִׁי֙ <S%H4897><s%> and silk וְרִקְמָ֔ה <S%H7553><s%> and broidered work סֹ֧לֶת <S%H5560><s%> fine flour וּדְבַ֛שׁ <S%H1706><s%> and honey וָשֶׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> and oil [אָכָלְתִּי כ] (אָכָ֑לְתְּ <S%H398><s%> burn up ק) וַתִּ֙יפִי֙ <S%H3302><s%> beautiful בִּמְאֹ֣ד <S%H3966><s%> and thou wast exceeding מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> were exceedingly וַֽתִּצְלְחִ֖י <S%H6743><s%> and thou didst prosper לִמְלוּכָֽה׃ <S%H4410><s%> into a kingdom

וַיֵּ֨צֵא <S%H3318><s%> went forth לָ֥ךְ שֵׁ֛ם <S%H8034><s%> And thy renown בַּגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen בְּיָפְיֵ֑ךְ <S%H3308><s%> for thy beauty כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> it was כָּלִ֣יל <S%H3632><s%> for it [was] perfect ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בַּֽהֲדָרִי֙ <S%H1926><s%> through my comeliness אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which שַׂ֣מְתִּי <S%H7760><s%> which I had put עָלַ֔יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> on נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> upon thee saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> GOD

וַתִּבְטְחִ֣י <S%H982><s%> But thou didst trust בְיָפְיֵ֔ךְ <S%H3308><s%> in thine own beauty וַתִּזְנִ֖י <S%H2181><s%> and playedst the harlot עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because שְׁמֵ֑ךְ <S%H8034><s%> because of thy renown וַתִּשְׁפְּכִ֧י <S%H8210><s%> and pouredst out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תַּזְנוּתַ֛יִךְ <S%H8457><s%> thy fornications עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every עוֹבֵ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> on every one that passed by לוֹ־ יֶֽהִי׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

וַתִּקְחִ֣י <S%H3947><s%> thou didst take מִבְּגָדַ֗יִךְ <S%H899><s%> And of thy garments וַתַּֽעֲשִׂי־ <S%H6213><s%> and deckedst לָךְ֙ בָּמ֣וֹת <S%H1116><s%> thy high places טְלֻא֔וֹת <S%H2921><s%> with divers colours וַתִּזְנִ֖י <S%H2181><s%> and playedst the harlot עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> on לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> never בָא֖וֹת <S%H935><s%> thereupon [the like things] shall not come וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> happen

וַתִּקְחִ֞י <S%H3947><s%> Thou hast also taken כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> jewels תִפְאַרְתֵּ֗ךְ <S%H8597><s%> thy fair מִזְּהָבִ֤י <S%H2091><s%> of my gold וּמִכַּסְפִּי֙ <S%H3701><s%> and of my silver אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֣תִּי <S%H5414><s%> which I had given לָ֔ךְ וַתַּעֲשִׂי־ <S%H6213><s%> thee and madest לָ֖ךְ צַלְמֵ֣י <S%H6754><s%> to thyself images זָכָ֑ר <S%H2145><s%> of men וַתִּזְנִי־ <S%H2181><s%> and didst commit whoredom בָֽם׃

וַתִּקְחִ֛י <S%H3947><s%> And tookest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּגְדֵ֥י <S%H899><s%> garments רִקְמָתֵ֖ךְ <S%H7553><s%> thy broidered וַתְּכַסִּ֑ים <S%H3680><s%> and coveredst וְשַׁמְנִי֙ <S%H8081><s%> mine oil וּקְטָרְתִּ֔י <S%H7004><s%> and mine incense [נָתַתִּי כ] (נָתַ֖תְּ <S%H5414><s%> add ק) לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וְלַחְמִי֩ <S%H3899><s%> My meat אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֨תִּי <S%H5414><s%> also which I gave לָ֜ךְ סֹ֣לֶת <S%H5560><s%> thee fine flour וָשֶׁ֤מֶן <S%H8081><s%> and oil וּדְבַשׁ֙ <S%H1706><s%> and honey הֶֽאֱכַלְתִּ֔יךְ <S%H398><s%> [wherewith] I fed וּנְתַתִּ֧יהוּ <S%H5414><s%> thee thou hast even set לִפְנֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H6440><s%> it before לְרֵ֥יחַ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <S%H5207><s%> them for a sweet וַיֶּ֑הִי <S%H1961><s%> happened נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> and [thus] it was saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD

וַתִּקְחִ֞י <S%H3947><s%> Moreover thou hast taken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנַ֤יִךְ <S%H1121><s%> thy sons וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנוֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H1323><s%> and thy daughters אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom יָלַ֣דְתְּ <S%H3205><s%> whom thou hast borne לִ֔י וַתִּזְבָּחִ֥ים <S%H2076><s%> unto me and these hast thou sacrificed לָהֶ֖ם לֶאֱכ֑וֹל <S%H398><s%> unto them to be devoured הַמְעַ֖ט <S%H4592><s%> a small matter [מִתַּזְנֻתֵךְ כ] (מִתַּזְנוּתָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H8457><s%> cut down ק)

וַֽתִּשְׁחֲטִ֖י <S%H7819><s%> That thou hast slain אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָ֑י <S%H1121><s%> my children וַֽתִּתְּנִ֔ים <S%H5414><s%> and delivered בְּהַעֲבִ֥יר <S%H5674><s%> them to cause them to pass through אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> לָהֶֽם׃

וְאֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all תּוֹעֲבֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H8441><s%> And in all thine abominations וְתַזְנֻתַ֔יִךְ <S%H8457><s%> and thy whoredoms לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not [זָכַרְתִּי כ] (זָכַ֖רְתְּ <S%H2142><s%> burn ק) אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> the days נְעוּרָ֑יִךְ <S%H5271><s%> of thy youth בִּֽהְיוֹתֵךְ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become עֵרֹ֣ם <S%H5903><s%> when thou wast naked וְעֶרְיָ֔ה <S%H6181><s%> and bare מִתְבּוֹסֶ֥סֶת <S%H947><s%> [and] wast polluted בְּדָמֵ֖ךְ <S%H1818><s%> in thy blood הָיִֽית׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> came אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> And it came to pass after כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all רָעָתֵ֑ךְ <S%H7451><s%> all thy wickedness א֣וֹי <S%H188><s%> (woe א֣וֹי <S%H188><s%> woe לָ֔ךְ נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> unto thee saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> God

וַתִּבְנִי־ <S%H1129><s%> [That] thou hast also built לָ֖ךְ גֶּ֑ב <S%H1354><s%> unto thee an eminent place וַתַּעֲשִׂי־ <S%H6213><s%> and hast made לָ֥ךְ רָמָ֖ה <S%H7413><s%> thee an high place בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every רְחֽוֹב׃ <S%H7339><s%> in every street אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every
